Tyron:
Now no one even remembers the forgotten treasures... But the cunning and quick-witted Varka Silenos and the Ketra Orc's constantly break camps and seek treasures. It would be to kill these creatures and take the treasure to yourself. True, in the treasure hunt, there is a risk of encountering a monster, about which terrible legends form.
Caves conceal and untold treasures, and incredible dangers. Remember this.
